titles.title: Juab County Surface and Ground Water Study and Development Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Reclamation Projects Authorization and Adjustment Act of 1992 to provide for the conjunctive use of surface and ground water in Juab County, Utah.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-677.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 10/3/2005--Introduced. Juab County Surface and Ground Water Study and Development Act of 2005 - Amends the Reclamation Projects Authorization and Adjustment Act of 1992 to include Juab County among those Utah counties for which Bonneville Unit of the Central Utah Project funds may be provided for a Utah Division of Water Resources feasibility study and development of systems to allow ground water recharge, management, and the conjunctive use of surface water resources with ground water resources.
